Pong
- as a demonstration of the pieces of web development. Primarily a first exercise in JavaScript implementation from concept to flowchart and pseudo code development through actual coding and some minor modifications. The class was introduced to jsfiddle.
Recipe Page
- was an exercise in the more common HTML element usage and an introduction to CSS. We moved into brackets for a more robust (and free) development editor.
Calculater
- this project continued CSS familiarization and expanded on JavaScript event handlers plus introductions to w3schools and codeacademy, and the JavaScript reference manualat Mozilla Developer Network. The use of code versioning software git became a specific necessity.
